1.title: Valorant App
1.description: Using the Valorant API, I developped an application that contains all the agents, weapons, and maps that can be found it the game. Each page has a special functionnality.

2.title: YUME
2.description: YUME is a Fullstack project was created during my semester in Japan. I wanted to develop a web application for couples and friends to learn to know each others with questions, and quizzes.

3.title: Etudate
3.description: Etudate is a dating app for students. It is a Fullstack project group.

4.title: Guess My RGB
4.description: Guess My RGB is a game where you try to find the correct RGB combination to win. It uses probability laws to help determine the final color.

5.title: Thomas was alone
5.description: This project is inspired by the platform game Thomas Was Alone.
